Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in New York City?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a popular sitcom that follows the lives of six friends in Manhattan.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the family in the TV show 'The Simpsons'?
Questions.Explanation: The Simpsons is an animated sitcom that revolves around the lives of the Simpson family.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Stars Hollow?
Questions.Explanation: Gilmore Girls is a dramedy series that takes place in the charming town of Stars Hollow.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the high school in the TV show 'Beverly Hills, 90210'?
Questions.Explanation: West Beverly High is the fictional school attended by the main characters in Beverly Hills, 90210.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of doctors at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital?
Questions.Explanation: Grey's Anatomy is a medical drama series that focuses on the personal and professional lives of the doctors at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Stranger Things is a sci-fi horror series that is set in the small town of Hawkins, Indiana.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a high school teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer?
Questions.Explanation: Breaking Bad is a critically acclaimed drama series that follows the transformation of Walter White from a high school chemistry teacher to a methamphetamine producer.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional island in the TV show 'Lost'?
Questions.Explanation: Lost is a mystery drama series that revolves around the survivors of a plane crash on a mysterious island simply referred to as 'The Island'.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the 1960s and focuses on an advertising agency in New York City?
Questions.Explanation: Mad Men is a period drama series that delves into the world of advertising and the personal lives of the employees at the fictional Sterling Cooper agency.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional hospital in the TV show 'House'?
Questions.Explanation: House is a medical drama series that takes place at the prestigious Princeton-Plainsboro Teaching Hospital.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world?
Questions.Explanation: The Walking Dead is a horror drama series that depicts the struggles of a group of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Twin Peaks'?
Questions.Explanation: Twin Peaks is a mystery drama series that is set in the small town of Twin Peaks, Washington.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends hanging out at a bar called MacLaren's?
Questions.Explanation: How I Met Your Mother is a sitcom that revolves around the lives of a group of friends who frequently meet at the bar MacLaren's.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional high school in the TV show 'Gossip Girl'?
Questions.Explanation: Gossip Girl is a teen drama series that is centered around the lives of privileged teenagers attending the elite Constance Billard School for Girls.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the 1980s and pays homage to the pop culture of that era?
Questions.Explanation: Stranger Things is a sci-fi horror series that captures the essence of the 1980s and references various pop culture elements from that time.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'The X-Files'?
Questions.Explanation: The X-Files is a sci-fi drama series that follows FBI agents Mulder and Scully as they investigate paranormal phenomena in various locations, including the fictional town of Mulderville.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in an apartment building called The Regal Beagle?
Questions.Explanation: Three's Company is a sitcom that revolves around the comedic misunderstandings and antics of three roommates living in The Regal Beagle apartment building.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional high school in the TV show 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'?
Questions.Explanation: Buffy the Vampire Slayer is a supernatural drama series that follows the adventures of Buffy Summers, a teenage girl chosen to battle against vampires and other supernatural forces while attending Sunnydale High.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the 1970s and focuses on a group of teenagers in Wisconsin?
Questions.Explanation: That '70s Show is a sitcom that depicts the lives of a group of teenagers hanging out in the fictional town of Point Place, Wisconsin, during the 1970s.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'The Twilight Zone'?
Questions.Explanation: The Twilight Zone is a sci-fi anthology series that explores strange and mysterious events occurring in various locations, including the fictional town of Willoughby.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in an apartment building called The Central Perk?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a popular sitcom that follows the lives of six friends in Manhattan, who often meet at the coffee shop called The Central Perk.
